text: Sitting volleyball will be played at the 2019 Parapan American Games. The winner of each tournament will be automatically qualified to participate in the 2020 Summer Paralympics. ==Medalists== {| |- | Men's tournament | | | |- | Women's tournament | | | |} ==Teams' roster== ;Men {| class="wikitable" |- |style="vertical-align:top;
